Wf’]flN~}ƒtbeŒ{}j‘svs?p•nwhey]hhOb£pk€w“€owy…|†S*dP—¨}†Rv¤gvlfThg„Iƒr€€…h\srfm<zyh[Zr9°¬wYaoŸ”xRhf}L^oyŠDkDwOv†~“l…e`yb{€o…‚”†axI¡mN‚Q£™gGxXU?‰o^…R’uŒ‹K’kq{pth½—n˜wp^`‡~~€ˆƒpR^ˆyybeSo[lhwem€Œx‡ZWwdx¢}u€y†oiVVhqp`‘og•w‡[l{r†pksf\ªfarun†ƒpdfzgŸlfdzyqx|bfasx~\zb€ƒ‚jx|sFmy}lz‡…|‡djŠopŠSyLjuwa|acp]Ma]^do{yRf]pd^pkjc|‚;go\ezmO€ƒnA‡^p|r_rankjmpaœ‚yn|x‡qy‹u}lQtn{}{ho~kƒˆ{j{xshc~lg†`iywŠšlwtfumy„ˆt„di_gZ{eq_y“u~krzrurpyp«qj{…z„p^g~ktŠU‚jxnzipeq{jbŠw{idqs‚†ptxˆb_l‹svodl„|w`‚pqƒSŒ_{xmj^`a}w_Tkbijyyf^Igggz}~gq„uOiwi…iSUyjv^…pjoxm~taqhqwc£pyjtp“_oœzj…]ƒduxcwmiƒ{v†uoinpŠMspm~le‹rƒ£g‚†ru‘z€~|^b\ie|wlr–yt`d‰‰p{nv_os¥h}ˆr“n€clh…`sˆO}ivy|xwh|‡ieŒuƒlpYT~yuƒ€‚qaŠ¤qROd‚‹~n†pdWeds{sVI_ytgfrnwztzi{Ygfo~z~koŠ[]esv’rOct`qzwe}Œƒ~Œ^w}mnŠ{ybro|jŒ¢|g{^cwzvg•QW¦~Z-w[h‡š™ˆlzq~<w„lN~^€kx©gxhĞ‘T`X9jŠPeÀjm‚B{rr}œ‘{¡t|TP/osNW|v‰iO£‚fWkhŒe:š†wU?o†”c‡qp˜uj‰…oh¥{o‡1]Xƒ–|}\|clko—V`]I”uOxt›˜d˜h˜;YzÃ—jˆi‚cƒ4x†s€=€‘huƒy]lf˜I2zŸ[‹_{‡~œcZty`€™]aGsdaN³[‚¤jKMbfa}A`‹|P„cš{›mZ‚…|;qhOnZbtyi~i‰v‚°~wjX|jxØ°!NVX{‡ÕWœ>i]d2‰VwX^U¶jE‡rvvoJ‹EZª…oS]k³£|a…p|`bk^¨†wn;omŒ„´rW{cmqv^˜cX¬‰yQ™ve„f°Ÿ «éFpLfwg?~xeuŠªnˆŠqrcYG&_zJzemja‡~dvlrk^;oq{‡ˆ‘@o•Z|Hi’‰£ŠZf†_dcXšs–Oš’·’q][ŸeI|r…rŠL³f\Cs„™s~{ho`º—{:h‹Vo¨fir¤dUJdf€`le‚}HFXsDV©ˆoklº–zqxWŸq¡a‡buy:hl€hSPp`¢‘…y‰‰­dp‹2PewMdf©¥\,t¸ w…—aµ”tE^ue~†±{†f\oz¿wQ’ncjWŸ}%lxVM¡jK—lƒq„}v[n]gz«¬VfzipevlZxd‡eooidk[¡ -wJ•`Qp[qmo{p‡cmlTYss^‡w†gcŒ’™x‰fgd~~~flxd€tv„s”ww{\£_k`tmp|mrttmw‚‚xjtrmŠ‚Šd~WY’ju‘Vk“o†mgdrsX{plszv„‡enzxdtdhiqWlm^nkidotNxcŒ¦{„‰vPj\‚Wˆ‰El`_pki€[…Mr…WnŠWƒyn{zXQˆvp¡o„y‹cfŠei_jksncdheŒwsYi˜bLug]lwirq…psw_cadgUrgcs“w|kWx}yXmygglb˜pŠ†Pkwh¡‚‚…c†T]zn|ƒŠ€–f}Wnkduozv„rŒr|Yldx€{ƒ‹‘‰eh‰l˜y…yI‡bjeg|SXwifYƒkm~oci[pszxp‹€hdf}dkiaX`nmiZHxNƒds’R|…zoyŠzŠ[d|ykstw|rUe\t|xi~zq\PZj–|’WiŸ`Zr‰^œˆgq\j†wv “Xk[rdNjo}g„š£jXq‘Ufˆup}qUwƒ“r[Lj‰’†dx€…o‚zƒlˆ˜cr{X•z}n„jn‰|\Lyqvjr„e^›Šd@Y‰m•|fz…qiM}]y{bioE\rynop…Uw“q€iTq`Wo‡™Ÿ¡pXlex–ˆV†Yr†oPsV¢sfRv~w{w’‹vMtx{jan|{|RwotsŠw{€zi~„†sr†r\|ƒƒuqhu„€ywruoiiyjoltgrokrtnj†tj}€`roz`‚j‹jq|‡yiusm{kks—f}][l…}oxl`uƒj{mkhr}rTmaxrxl†algmprq^np„pvz{zsul‹nY{r‚{jyoqbjysnfnkfpmtv|oq\…rmq…iuu^b‚sj{|ti€sk€knlf‹ug^|tul~h‹|zˆŒqq‚p‰esqw{w{{…j‡†}z~las‡|vkuoy|txmnxeug[p|ƒWftvmrb}qg„wa„‡p~jq|•ee{„vpwo|ou{¥lwP`i‹ayvmjhihtrq~€Uhett}lyikxxjioq}yr~{~qs~{q‚kq{x{~mnatwhvlkhktqklpbnudg|wtlyqaku^zzjfywph†ˆpvzlmv|rojhn}m‚ms{u{x|qqk…hkjysovv~k„‡z€w{vjijˆ{sˆox~j€v}ld~z‚Ugfu|irerp`|vpƒut`b…’ncm‹‡mu~~u‚u†|šk€eoh‡Ys€xn‚„ryt…{xsuklnbh‡kntqnƒeyyŠrjptyi‹r‚[zp€jwvjfnrhƒmog„nttl[mmep†qyywdslkaos`b{pp~~€zo€mvu†n~g}xxtoermpƒƒsvslskyamZ‘ŒWkluqyhmQhzrl‚<Z“RjfŠrd‚ Œy||zr‚iz~]eUfsJ[hˆu”^y’Pk]k^”i^vY—Uklw°ekmlh„ƒn•rkŠq‰§‚†wquŒngijh~Wt‹„]zaqtK|jzcdktpkrnmsa¦yefxx{Œy}w_Dbk]pwrod\uZxwxhRwz€iu{kx…I|porƒsbŒlq‰w‘{mŠgtao„zh{ihh‚nu{yrpi‹tgiwjh‚fƒ`znŒ„x™p•xwƒy}~f•ga`em‚dRj„‰tmnˆd~kur‰d[wƒisfS™htfw–k|s‡k†‡g…fŒ‚mSaqgtoai``nP™›mqW‘i\‡j…uq|sMclb|tyqeƒkQtƒgq…†V“raAjo[clzfytovTok‡o‡„y}uy{q„qMquk{n“|mo]tˆp‰…\|c‚ynZm‚qj|pes\nsib]„gfueq}jZ}r|w›ozpk~~rw\u\„…L‚|pf]vf”R^_q_uyp‘xrzdoX‹fWœ|hirvsl€qlzus_WhŒmybipŸsb†€D‰˜~uaY†]pov{€jtIxfGXq‰mfjek‡uix”Q‚RkOfi]qvZ€keppkkp|kzŒtzqfd‹ƒ†U}f†q‰pbvcs{Špšrmzz‘cGucdyatz^_nsnFotexVuchygnln†myx~™‚p„ids|mu]Šsƒmw‘R[U\g‰|rghkuƒka]‚n~ff|lpix_z”‡Ÿjty€x‡Œ“l‚ƒ‰krŒkˆk„~~w|j…LkdzprgcXg€ljeX\~h„k€~ƒvmQpˆ{qy•wz‡kabyœwu^{j‹ˆ…{…ojw}ziw…|wyiaWsf…„]um]ZfZXœxiŒoƒS`viƒkyJ`pttk†YpjsFV†td~^iQz„cc||€•yt‚T]ymj`…Yie}XTb}i€i}Megk„\gk…t‘nh~ŠˆjNxsw‹kf|†qxj‚–WlŸ—sr€h„cmvy…ƒ„‡mezrp†cO…€i[^j~_gc€~Šbp‡p_’y‹hƒpc“~utUx‹{ayi~n}zo]rns{t{mxg„lTWpj~i‘^a^hqcp{hP«magmXy’wvjFs]gzqshŒervD`vcpbkUŒuWtƒuj€dqpb|gtn{iT€rzuDVa]~‚^o_u_lwRs^p–xmmv„‡v}ynsŒ{g‰tmœZk•j§^‹–wz…rkr|}liltSw‡_†^sl~‹|luotwS\dqbuWhkqQ[™se~hŒ†t_fwwdrn{|…Ylkg_Šfmƒ[‰‡tƒZZŸfV{uQjomzolŠi]§cZƒ›x¦s†•›Kn•…snm¤jceyi}zcme€scQQ€„sN‘„^k‘amipZœzsx†‚—eZˆ^x‰zLgimh^com¢Xbid\…XŠ~Xthucsznn‘v|lFyuaKgƒfgu§||¬knkYu£h™rb‡kyg€xqnŠxf‚r[‘\\a{yAš@v›€Uˆd¤†‰n€A…z‚˜€—–h’{zl„zoƒy|‡„Fqh\‹v_q{†huvwˆ@j‡xw‹wk—O{l’lcfxw|vs¸J}ŒŠfl€CŠvƒUxƒqzj‹dRƒS‡y|lx„|afˆ{a^b¥VaboU’ˆye¥Gƒvfq€pzw‚dghkl‡Šm_kSuB_w_`]kn™†——ˆ‡}\‰U}qy‰h}rmig‡}jn^v{_wp‘lWBp“ƒkbd†[šrp‚kzu•ƒbŒ•oƒ}ˆ‘k‡€qhv…VmqX|pWrbo|meu||`‚dwy…aks{sS—šrgmzma§af~r‘Œ©g{iƒ~Wœh’Œe—’r’[˜~[Ytizcbhcl™•umLk~‰V™\Œas‹VyoŠbnw|m€|ƒe{_†Ym„l]i‰}„tqo[•€q[b}os]fv…xitkl„€„m‰lu__g‘Il†xo}v€cz€u’p€†‹iy„ez€Z„‚lpei[rxW‡nGlfxfuklln^Šr_#i™™ƒm¨‹[D³yb4r±Gpm›WQ`njaU€‡};q~zRI£h£YªlNBdˆwGwV¡:£^@usZsA‰pe~hbw,U[>KeWC/fkXÀ^†U¾N–PqcF{tUZcˆ`bM¤q³eh€…²h~(fv¡‚]Fi€f‡]…Ec”|zt‘|R¥‰b‘XŒ¤7j†UM ~e•€omp~p†D¨‹U†x´B=l’k|tw‹Bƒ¹Kt•G/ƒ{†ak~d‡ˆPuiN‚£ym€¡3[¡|wnˆsxhŸ|T5w4],x¤Txl]eQS~NnA;hiM_raIcRƒGg®BP?[m]ˆrc‚g9i¶sÌEn|jkR[Ttlkap\‚kyÅŠ¤ƒ„D€ŠkaVq}”q«N•?{LWQo€as~BŒv…kJs…–4jm]‰a¤±v‚˜r|At…ƒ€xn€iP”tSx¶„M—c”;KT˜iŒio—Op–fu`œhParƒV‰¢i—Rp~aT€…„td%—•Z\gp—j©e†x¤j}zAIWz—oŠx@¡oYhxJƒCLRcNŠtp‘HlM˜@U…V8;nk‘•zZ‡J~›O•‚†Mx‘Creœ]eJ|¥‚…4›€a–˜Tˆn¡ZDpYˆ¬{–›“fŠS—M’Th–kz#RdsPEoCu—__baj]€xo†[†}}t3yoK3§x•¬4TŠLjˆ8ªH‰‰}b}ue[~]Pm\…s]bmwqqgxsxYofqshuo‡^|Ozg„t^‰…s€z`ti’kpstf^eo˜t‡wŒ\sd}‰u}ky…lury‡d‚pR†nPŒxƒbXoumqpriO|zuskyxor‡|rtlyYŠxtis}y~sWh†vv’ksrdnh‚|uppzosh`|Xsrqqhn€e‚|ˆyuxhrd_w{zsJehzovrpw{~}nnn~kv|nviƒg{}q†oy€‚o€‡xlY{u]`uuZfbi”yfyyobl]qdttzuxl‹xiuh‡kozqowthpn€Npx‡ˆ€_nr…zcld{ƒmkVVn~b…ƒ“{kmtwgpsupk…|mjrumytˆxjsqul„q{xk’ˆzfeau‡|}‚~`ƒ|dtmz{llnzjljocq{rfqgkxszky}us^f{z}sJhsvhrurwxymomttp{iprv~h}t„rrrunƒu‚„d„`Wsl„jdondy‡{ˆrih„|o„hwp^gpfvs}youw{mwfv“Z‚jw{|}€kqm„mdpoz{nglkpgbo‡vo{wwV`ƒx{ivxarypxl‡‡h}€bxs‡€wƒspjpijyz‚}c|ikmugyjfbt…q_cx_|m{fnjqzwv~^t~lp…n‡€€|hv~xzxvti†l‘oh~zrubnmbqmxxmowc[f†Ft•L…x<iÖ„”w]nl’ncsf†‰PTan:’†qlm›GBŠƒ²— Xsl[vx\QG|O¦€XM™¦“ita/o“’_®v vSŠY|fF¯sgqO …_Y’£^’&RPK|iXcŠP‚zCy~XPƒ¡~m\ŠeuqsX‰ybrŒzj|¯O˜r²rVc±‡°šDc:‘[°lœŠc…d{]ƒtu„!a…“²Tw¨G€]9Š‹l>tRg¹® Kll|}j‚lhP’w^‘N[\T„°l‹`ftiŠ‰puv‡ˆ^_wU_Š’zFx‚„P±”xŒhvqŠ{nHz‰—ˆ™hSˆrlynUKg|Vq_·¤X\\Pw]gyr€]Š–Y|jh|b^ J\ZM‹pU‚Wuc‡s|§WzauFi˜In„–Q„Tn[€fvml1…ˆk\IafµÀ}Te%ZoZŒ~Š}CO…JOtz|Areo§¢º?zRk‘eK9nhv_¿“{y¶’y†S]g‡v‚U%NŠ†~xƒhj~„•­acq‹˜¦ay…ƒk¤œqƒº•QN{O¥`„¡mn‡†UD7Rk¦mpOGAˆP\5miknftqZƒUi]Btp~]lviDyˆ’]eZ€g!Y&qY_k¢ft‹c’a‹x}cMlmj‘L[CaJkL_o¡pbnt61SrMzIBW8¶¹v`a„Y‹{‰i‹<¶Šan…Vr[oG…y¢X¢D‰ˆV]Y‚”ƒFŒy•ŒfhlŒCZ‚‰‚Q<Ytr“\V;bUY¤K]N¿‹TWg„èeCwNX‚Ÿ†nË­n™9on‘›‘£‚’.Tm#%™M„ 6o–mZj%¥n`q4bsX²P5/N?dJB²PŸuVdz‹5²Xw‚uR}]l–‰Ry©‰‘8\>ˆ¾swX|EhcqT†ºWpa«¬~Ylyi}š/ldÕgSÊxjT•}O‘‚…‘§…cªdw}SJ_Tw’™]P_h^^>~tv\rj‹dO¬e¿hAxmd.›kmbi—O^(‚AYEMqf—nK5¨ié‡‡l‹Ô¶S[hŸH~OHnl¯}K0X'eœrD^T«]’\Q©#UK‚SQxA|…IX•›TlnŒ‹ÿ#rqq‘.†{yb„Rm–’tƒ‡¯¤bKL†–¤l‹O4v‰bfMl¾œ…N_oŒ_]~„Š‚œv©R‘LBºtªs†_euŸgP~s‰ˆ‘†€”w~OkmjkwHNwxnrT‹h\Ÿ]O.b_•Yg…ZvHZTšmeXnXWhkm[^S²qULy_ybœŒ¬‹;‘‚w]NnzCf¯CN’]•Ó_K;Q‹m7]Pn††Î‡HzA‡ƒ M?‘G…OYv‰s¡MÖ~˜Êc•ŠYš…M[‚N†xI›Šs’{q¬mk©fb\tqzˆf‚m_¹x c ¡ ƒ†mRLk^I¹‚`]Zµ<p=_Œ•œ¨µdjlcbc Y»€§:h¦‹t‚ge—„z†B]“gfA}š†nh„tIe€‰\iˆ/]nˆ™€pn{ªoqubs]yI†hhwHzl}fu‰pqzjj~‚ª`h\…N’tp{®ƒ‹Xfx\mPzxnšz€q[fQ‹auc€—ff€?|H~oUQpjl‡qƒfuŠn˜wymFCy‚„TƒmalXu„ŒutR†Nu¤ˆe¨~>ltYpvo“m‹iX|ak›€{jjzƒes“yqo•daj}rhbtXz[>€§†k†p?mp_^—|xƒmTy~u”q¢„v€Ÿe}du©ws…—[_ƒq{uywnbxRc|ih/q‡sƒx—s‡iz;t€bgs{Š…}‰—eXd^g{uw›P‚Z]WNk‰cLxv{r€vln~xln‚‚hpvY®|kƒŠ‡y]d“svyluU{pmjcXv‡xgWƒ|axozf¬i‡h\\w•u‡›xoymw…g}osgr|Hz‚‚ncnoqU~DzNV…{tY€Ixkª‚9onfŠ^yiƒfk›vaOX“ˆt}‹S‰^°€_ojwœ’m_’«{D<¦rR’Y„hn|]{‘mv}†dOe`ŒwaTk†ŠhL‡wVckbbštj}ixwƒ|˜’nXV†ˆ†I~rh}k}MXnvpw¡lumz„‰b{O}~v„zW\ˆrv_Š€}huTyxwq…dxkz‡S{[m›ƒ~mo‹tx}\eh¬aœzi„Ÿ“s˜€pqjs‚raw~`k{™lyT‡¤y„StPu{r‘q[rš]b^vg;Gƒr›Qoh||ˆ‚nfue€|t‚bŒmmbV…x~h†wv_›kt„’R8jvuh^]h…Znwmmyquwa\{jt~v†S]sŠvr_Vmu„sf~P_v}}ˆikZXhmfngw‰…znbsebqexrrnx{e‰vyqo•vpniWj[‚gjs†t‹h„l’c”i{b†€moegc}|cQsiZ~yh„lk€c_ŸVk}unuˆ€t–]…ˆtgWoedNHmg™bouˆ„kpyTm„ccfyRˆ{ZXRšntsUew~hdyq‹T[mg|ZzPŒWks‹ukˆ’soacjo~p™yDnx}vl‚e[”_‚\qowˆƒ„ˆ]\ƒmb_hgvzn{gsvwj“‰qq]f|Uzxx€{tosi]\qrz~x‘enifaxx†Jfšsrr~^^qyiht]~Ir_„ptcyn]€xpayb–Yk¡si‰‰Fˆw~}zZq{Š•Kseye^]ev€y…x{PKnu|kxl?€Vl|‹Wdnw€oWm†y{qhlk€yftmMn‚x˜_kŒ‡kvg…wLsgk…‰~|m|’a†ntywn}j~y…gsƒkq]h…z]bb…†‚yndttytc|a@\‡goyhVcSE“zwYt­jzfbpŒ‰l8e€vy“WuJ‚^g‚\wsggpS†lcmu_varh~UR“bSU‰fwsk„…xov„Z`œv¡ e €tyXP–ogqku”segˆyWaŠqt˜[l…kj„e?£ƒ¢hbty[i‡nsM> y|[q{l|R£§/\b{iis_wv‡†U~•|‰gyŒ4s•uavghƒ{Bao‚NŠob`w‡_x`‘@E“sqyg}taOYUg‘onlz{ZŠ€t]F]œŠ]tpFqSWlavN•{Š‘]Zx„•e@f™A‘OU€}{yV6~–i™u’UuayrƒLAf(
    `
    Executes all the files and interprets their output as
    TAP formatted test result data.

    To parse TAP data from stdin, specify "-" as a filename.
  `
  )

  // flags don't take a value, they're boolean on or off, and can be
  // turned off by prefixing with `--no-`
  // so this adds support for -b to mean --bail, or -B to mean --no-bail
  .flag({
    flag: {
      // specify a short value if you like.  this must be a single char
      short: 'f',
      // description is optional as well.
      description: `Make the flags wave`,
      // default value for flags is 'false', unless you change it
      default: true,
    },
    'no-flag': {
      // you can can always negate a flag with `--no-flag`
      // specifying a negate option will let you define a short
      // single-char option for negation.
      short: 'F',
      description: `Do not wave the flags`,
    },
  })

  // Options that take a value are specified with `opt()`
  .opt({
    reporter: {
      short: 'R',
      description: 'the style of report to display',
    },
  })

  // if you want a number, say so, and jackspeak will enforce it
  .num({
    jobs: {
      short: 'j',
      description: 'how many jobs to run in parallel',
      default: 1,
    },
  })

  // A list is an option that can be specified multiple times,
  // to expand into an array of all the settings.  Normal opts
  // will just give you the last value specified.
  .optList({
    'node-arg': {},
  })

  // a flagList is an array of booleans, so `-ddd` is [true, true, true]
  // count the `true` values to treat it as a counter.
  .flagList({
    debug: { short: 'd' },
  })

  // opts take a value, and is set to the string in the results
  // you can combine multiple short-form flags together, but
  // an opt will end the combine chain, posix-style.  So,
  // -bofilename would be like --bail --output-file=filename
  .opt({
    'output-file': {
      short: 'o',
      // optional: make it -o<file> in the help output insead of -o<value>
      hint: 'file',
      description: `Send the raw output to the specified file.`,
    },
  })

// now we can parse argv like this:
const { values, positionals } = j.parse(process.argv)

// or decide to show the usage banner
console.log(j.usage())

// or validate an object config we got from somewhere else
try {
  j.validate(someConfig)
} catch (er) {
  console.error('someConfig is not valid!', er)
}
```

## Name

The inspiration for this module is [yargs](http://npm.im/yargs), which
is pirate talk themed. Yargs has all the features, and is infinitely
flexible. "Jackspeak" is the slang of the royal navy. This module
does not have all the features. It is declarative and rigid by design.
